posts.post_content: Long time lurker, new member Looking to buy a low grade T-206 with a Hindu back. Player not important, but prefer a PSA numerical grade (1 or 2) with a clear back / no paper loss but will go raw or 'A' if it looks clean. Looking to spend no more than $150 shipped.

I just checked some comps and realized that I might be a bit low on my price target.  Would be willing to be around 200-225, still might be low, but that's all I can swing right now.  sorry for the newbie mistake of posting prior to checking comps.
